<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task_sla</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="task_sla">sla=b12349d8939f42100d6eb4897bba1061^stage=breached^EQ<item display_table="contract_sla" display_value="Aguardar a aprovação da Avaliação" endquery="false" field="sla" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="b12349d8939f42100d6eb4897bba1061"/><item display_value="Breached" endquery="false" field="stage" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="breached"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Handle SLA Expiry for RITM</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    var ritmGr = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
    if (ritmGr.get(current.task)) {
        ritmGr.setValue('state', '-10'); // 'On Hold' value
        ritmGr.update();

        // Enviar notificação para Assigned To e Requested For
        var email = new GlideEmailOutbound();
        email.setSubject('SLA Expired: RITM On Hold');
        email.setBody('The SLA for the RITM has expired and the state has been set to On Hold.');
        
        // Para Assigned To
        if (ritmGr.assigned_to) {
            email.addAddress('to', ritmGr.assigned_to.email);
        }

        // Para Requested For
        if (ritmGr.requested_for) {
            email.addAddress('to', ritmGr.requested_for.email);
        }

        email.send();
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-10 20:21:37</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c80bdbf9931b02100d6eb4897bba107e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Handle SLA Expiry for RITM</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Raposa Carrossel" source="x_908210_raposa_0">b96e80b5930302100d6eb4897bba1042</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Raposa Carrossel">b96e80b5930302100d6eb4897bba1042</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c80bdbf9931b02100d6eb4897bba107e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-10 20:21:55</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c80bdbf9931b02100d6eb4897bba107e"/></record_update>
